Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Southbound Reroute at Ashland/Fulton
ShortDescription: Southbound 9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Grand, Ogden, Carroll and Ashland, due to street blockage near Ashland/Fulton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Grand, Ogden, Carroll and Ashland, due to street blockage near Ashland/Fulton.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #9 Ashland, #X9 Ashland Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Ashland/Madison
ShortDescription: Northbound 9 Ashland, X9 Ashland Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Fulton, Ogden, Grand and Ashland, due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #9 Ashland, #X9 Ashland Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Fulton, Ogden, Grand and Ashland, due to street blockage near Ashland/Madison.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Reroute at Kimball/Bloomingdale
ShortDescription: 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Kimball, North Ave, Kedzie, Armitage and Kimball, due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Kimball, North Ave, Kedzie, Armitage and Kimball, due to street blockage near Kimball/Bloomingdale.

Allow extra travel time.
